track.name: You’re Never Over
comments: v it's because of the 2 different apostrophes ...."You’re" vs. "You're"... ’’’’’’  is not the same as ''''''... the same tag with "You're" has over 50.000 listeners
I don't understand. Why this song doesn't have more plays on the chart? It's incredible moving and very very emotional. Not many artists has the balls to write and spit something like this.
I love this song, so fucking good! R.I.P Proof.

Eminem is killing it. Album sales for Recovery are doing so well. Not Afraid and On Fire are getting so much play on the radio. Check out this review on the album http://www.badhabitatmusic.com/eminem-new-album-recovery I bought a couple of Recovery CD's on Amazon for cheap.
Really no way to describe the lyrics on this song.. So amazing on some parts
Wow Em's new album is hot! Read the review http://www.badhabitatmusic.com/eminem-new-album-recovery
DO YA THING EM! Glad we got u back...the rap game NEEDS you!!
he's gonna sing, because he's happy. Yeah, he's happy.
